citations.narrative:
Twenty three feeders (8 in the north row, 7 in the middle row, 8 in the south row) had rusted edges guinea pigs can touch
that were found to be rough or sharp to the touch.
In the middle section, some old water sipper covers of valves no longer in use have rough/sharp edges where guinea pigs
can touch them.
Rough/sharp edges can cause injury to the guinea pigs. To protect the guinea pigs from injury, ensure that all surfaces
and fixtures that the guinea pigs can touch are well maintained and of smooth materials.

Many enclosures had accumulated wet and soiled material around the drinking water valves and ammonia odors were
noticeable around these areas. Wet soiled material can cause animal discomfort and increases odors in the building.
Ensure to clean any wet soiled areas often enough to prevent any build-up of soiled material in the enclosure.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.28(a)(1)  Repeat
   
Primary enclosures. 
Twenty three feeders (8 in the north row, 7 in the middle row, 8 in the south row) had rusted edges guinea pigs can touch 
that were found to be rough or sharp to the touch.  
In the middle section, some old water sipper covers of valves no longer in use have rough/sharp edges where guinea pigs 
can touch them. 
Rough/sharp edges can cause injury to the guinea pigs. To protect the guinea pigs from injury, ensure that all surfaces 
and fixtures that the guinea pigs can touch are well maintained and of smooth materials. 
3.31(a)(1)  Repeat
   
Sanitation. 
Many enclosures had accumulated wet and soiled material around the drinking water valves and ammonia odors were 
noticeable around these areas. Wet soiled material can cause animal discomfort and increases odors in the building. 
Ensure to clean any wet soiled areas often enough to prevent any build-up of soiled material in the enclosure. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
